channel.title: MTE on juppytt's blog
channel.description: Recent content in MTE on juppytt's blog

item.title: Black Hat USA 2024
item.description: From August 5th to 11th 2024, I attended Black Hat USA 2024 (and Defcon 2024) in Las Vegas. I presented my research on Bypassing MTE with a side-channel attack. I returned to Korea this morning (luckily, no jet lag) and am writing this post to share my experiences from Las Vegas before I forget them. Black Hat USA 2024 First Black Hat experience I’ve never been to Black Hat before, so I was very excited, especially since I was going to present for the first time in an international conference.
